entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
